body: vim.api.nvim_create_autocmd("FileType", {
pattern = "${1:ft}",
callback = function()
end,
<node nodeID="${2}_N-0" description="" kilometre="2.0" x="2.5" xNet="2.5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${2}_N-1" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${2}_T-1" trackID="T-1" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track 1" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${2}_T-2" trackID="T-2" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track 2" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${2}_S-1" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${2}_S-2" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${2}_S-3" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${2}_S-4" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${0}_N-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_S-1" target="${2}_N-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${2}_N-0" target="${2}_N-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${2}_N-1" target="${2}_T-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${2}_N-1" target="${2}_T-2" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${2}_T-1" target="${2}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${2}_T-2" target="${2}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${2}_S-1" target="${0}_N-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_T-1 ${1}_S-1"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_T-2 ${1}_S-1"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_T-1 ${1}_S-1 ${2}_N-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_T-2 ${1}_S-1 ${2}_N-0 "/>
<!-- Nong Kai -->
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${2}" nodes=" ${2}_N-0 ${2}_N-1 ${2}_T-1 ${2}_S-1"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${2}" nodes=" ${2}_N-0 ${2}_N-1 ${2}_T-2 ${2}_S-1"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${2}" nodes=" ${2}_S-1 ${0}_N-0"/>
